title: NVDY: Continues To Benefit From NVDA's Outperformance

NVDA earnings and a fresh batch of economic data ahead of the Thanksgiving holiday. title: Nvidia reactions from the Street

title: Nvidia's AI-Powered Earnings, Revenue, and Guidance Crush Estimates

title: Nvidia shares to open lower despite nine-figure revenue beat
text: Nvidia Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) shares are expected to open 0.2% lower when Nasdaq opens on Wednesday, extending a nearly 1% drop on Tuesday.
